## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (a8ae97fa36df6e711d0ea73a1f876400b9a066f495d574506be539cccfcb3b9d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'learning-kotlin' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
